sentence: Mr. CLEAVER. Mr. Speaker, I rise today with immense sorrow along with  Missouri's 5th Congressional District, to commemorate the life and  legacy of a great Kansas Citian, Ms. Alice Kitchen. The fruits of  Alice's advocacy for women, children, and marginalized communities will  live on for generations to come. Alice was a force to be reckoned with,  stopping…
